name: Atom (itch) (Michael Davidowitz)
description:
WASD - Move

Mouse - Rotate Player

You play as an atom trying to create the largest molecule, but the other atoms don't want you to.

- Collect as many white atoms as you can, they add to your score

- Grey atoms pretend to be white and they take away from your score so you should avoid them

- Orange atoms chase you and if they touch you it's over , and Red atoms are faster variants

- Bombable Atoms are stationary and if you accidently pick one up *POOF* dead
